header.introduction: Hi! How nice to have you here! my name is Rafael Godoy and I have a degree in Front-End Web Development from the technology school Trybe, where I am completing the training in Back-End Web Development. Here you will get to know a little of my trajectory and see where my curious nature has taken me so far. You will also be able to see under what values I built my history and how I see the world. Come on?
